title: 如何使用命令方块检测某方块上的玩家
author: t1546542
txt_content:
我想让一个玩家踩到一个特定的方块上后会触发tp指令
求大佬解答！

replies.author: rooke_zb
replies.txt_content:
ruhuasiyu 发表于 2019-6-1 21:54
execute as @a at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ stone run tp @s 0 0 0

你得说你的版本
1.13之前：execute.@a ~ ~-1 ~ detect ~ ~ ~ minecraft:stone /tp @p ~ ~100 ~
1.13之后：execute as @a at @s if blcok ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:stone run tp @s ~ ~100 ~

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
execute as @a at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ stone run tp @s 0 0 0

你得说你的版本
